item.title: The Woke Oscars Will Be Entirely Out Of Step With The National Vibe Shift Right
item.description: It’s impossible to see the current list of Oscar nominees as anything more than different iterations of the same tired woke formula.

item.title: Target’s Press Releases Show It’s Lying About Ditching DEI
item.description: The only steps taken by Target are for the express purpose of deceiving you. There’s no authentic change of heart.

item.title: Polls Show Majorities Of Americans Support Trump’s Mass Deportations
item.description: A wide range of polls demonstrate that the left’s assumption that President Trump and his policies are unpopular is simply wrong.

item.title: The Dirty Dozen: Here Are Wasteful Federal Grants You’re Paying For
item.description: From $100,000 for a girls' fun run in Gaza to $700,000 to push edible insects, taxpayers are getting ripped off.

item.title: 5 Military Officials Whose Damaging Left-Wing Antics Must Be Accounted For
item.description: Mark Milley is one of several military officers who deserve accountability for the damage they've done to the force.
